sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Main Street Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Main Street Act.

sections.heading: Legislative purpose. The General Assembly makes the following findings:
sections.text: Legislative purpose. The General Assembly makes the following findings:

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Illinois Main Street Program. The Illinois Main Street Program is created, subject to appropriation, within the Department
sections.text: In order to implement the Illinois Main Street Program, the Department may do all of the following:

sections.heading: Illinois Main Street Plan. The Department may, in consultation with the Lieutenant Governor, develop a plan for the Illinois Main Street Program
Role of the Lieutenant Governor
sections.text: The Lieutenant Governor shall, subject to appropriation, be the Ambassador of the Illinois Main Street Program. The Department shall, subject to appropriation, advise and consult with the Lieutenant Governor on the activities of the Illinois Main Street Program. The

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
